name: Holiday Inn Express Strathclyde Park

reviews.title: Decent place to stay
reviews.text: My family and I stayed here over the final weekend of the British Open golf championship. The place was pretty full, but we still enjoyed our time here. Our room on the ground-floor was fine for our needs. Initially there was no TV remote-control, but the girl on reception soon found us one. The buffet breakfast was varied and well-stocked. All members of staff we encountered were very friendly and keen to help.

reviews.title: Enjoyed our stay at the Strathclyde Express
reviews.text: I've stayed here before and I'd happily stay here again.

We stayed at this hotel for 1 night in June 2007, hotel is in a nice area (in a park) and convinently has a Toby Carvery opposite which is very useful for eating at night time. The lobby was nice and had computers which you could use (for a fee) and the reception staff were friendly and answered any questions, The breakfast area was nice and there was also a lounge area with a TV if you wanted to have a drink there (you could order drinks from reception 24 hours a day!), The rooms were nice and included a desk, TV and Internet service (which I could not get to work unfortunatley), The room we had included 1 double bed and 1 sofa bed which I found to be uncomfortable but adequate. The bathroom was also nice and modern. Overall I would reccommend this hotel for people looking to visit Glasgow (it isnt too far away)
reviews.title: Nice Hotel in nice area

reviews.text: The four of us (2 adults, 2 children) stayed two nights at this hotel on a short leisure trip. The room we stayed in was pretty small, even compared to other Express by Holiday Inn hotels, but nevertheless it was clean and tidy.
reviews.title: Efficient hotel in great location

reviews.text: If you have small children like us you'll love the location - right next to the Amazonia theme park and a leisure centre with a soft-play area in! For business and leisure travellers alike, the location is terrific being just off the M74 at junction 5. It's quite a central location with easy access to Glasgow, East Kilbride, Hamilton etc.
reviews.title: Unremarkable

reviews.text: If you're looking for efficient and economical but don't fancy slumming it at a Travelodge, you shouldn't be dissapointed here.
reviews.title: awful service
PURGATORY
reviews.text: I stayed at the Strathclyde park Holiday Inn Express on 12th September. Check-in was efficient but inpersonal - why are so many receptionists unable to smile or make eye contact when greeting guests?

reviews.title: Very happy with our stay...
reviews.text: I recently spent a night in twin-room 001 at the HI Express Strathclyde. It was located in the corridor to the left of Reception but thankfully we were not disturbed by noise from there, or from the front-entrance.
The room was clean, well-maintained and very comfortable.

aka: Holiday Inn Express Strathclyde Park Hotel
description: The 120 bedroom Express by Holiday Inn Strathclyde Park M74, JCT.5, is ideal for Corporate and Leisure clients, offering ensuite accommodation including Complimentary Continental Breakfast with selected Hot Items, FREE Car Parking spaces for upto 120 cars. We are on Jct 5 off the M74. The Express By Holiday Inn Strathclyde is located in the Strathclyde Country park with Motherwell Food Park with Companies like Honeywell and TNT close by. Hamilton,Motherwell and Eurocentral are within 5 minutes driving distance from the Hotel. Glasgow Airport is a 25 minute drive and Edinburgh Airport is a 40 minute drive from the Hotel.The Hotel is situated within the complex of attractions, such as Strathclyde Country Park with its Watersports centre, country walks and purpose built M & D's Theme Park (open all year round with FREE entry). Other places of interest are David Livingston Centre, the Time Capsule Leisure Centre and a Golf Course just 1.5 miles away. Glasgow City Centre is just a 25 minutes drive from the Hotel and easily accessible to Gleneagles and St. Andrews Golf Courses . There is a Bar/ Lounge available for resident guests from 11am to 3am daily and 2 Meeting rooms for upto 30 people offering all audio / visual equipment and business facilities. High Speed Internet Access available throughout the Hotel ( FREE in the Lounge Area.) Sorry but we Do Not Accept Pets!
